mapper.sql: A.id AS id,A.username AS username,A.password AS password,A.real_name AS realName,A.is_real_auth AS isRealAuth,A.sex AS sex,A.relation_id AS relationId,A.create_doctor_id AS createDoctorId,A.user_relation AS userRelation,A.phone AS phone,A.login_name AS loginName,A.tel AS tel,A.phone_conceal AS phoneConceal,A.email AS email,A.avatar AS avatar,A.avatar_pic_id AS avatarPicId,A.contact_way AS contactWay,A.last_login_time AS lastLoginTime,A.address AS address,A.province AS province,A.city AS city,A.weixin AS weixin,A.qq AS qq,A.job_id AS jobId,A.birthday AS birthday,A.qr_code AS qrCode,A.qr_code2 AS qrCode2,A.third_name AS thirdName,A.third_id AS thirdId,A.third_password AS thirdPassword,A.role_id AS roleId,A.organization AS organization,A.idcard_num AS idcardNum,A.certificate_type AS certificateType,A.certificate_number AS certificateNumber,A.certificate_name AS certificateName,A.description AS description,A.serial AS serial,A.type_id AS typeId,A.link_id AS linkId,A.group_id AS groupId,A.grade_id AS gradeId,A.main_status AS mainStatus,A.logic_status AS logicStatus,A.attr_decimal AS attrDecimal,A.attr_str AS attrStr,A.attr_int AS attrInt,A.sequence AS sequence,A.remark AS remark,A.deleted_at AS deletedAt,A.deleted_by AS deletedBy,A.created_at AS createdAt,A.created_by AS createdBy,A.updated_at AS updatedAt,A.updated_by AS updatedBy
,pca.area_name AS provinceName, pca1.area_name AS cityName, d2.code_name AS jobName, u.username AS patientName, u.username AS userRelationName

sql.if: AND A.id IN ( SELECT dp.user_id FROM doctor_patient dp WHERE dp.doctor_id = #{belongDoctorId} )
AND A.id IN ( SELECT dp.user_id FROM doctor_patient dp LEFT JOIN doctor d ON d.id = dp.doctor_id WHERE d.hospital_id = #{belongHospitalId} )

mapper.sql: LEFT JOIN province_city_area pca ON A.province = pca.id LEFT JOIN province_city_area pca1 ON A.city = pca1.id LEFT JOIN dict d2 ON A.job_id = d2.id LEFT JOIN user u ON A.relation_id = u.id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM A
WHERE A.serial = #{serial,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LIMIT 0,1
mapper.update:
